articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Reddit digs out video of Alia Bhatt 'lying' about destination weddings and Neetu exposing her plans to marry in Africa - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Alia Bhatt said in an old interview that she doesn't like destination weddings. Earlier, Neetu Kapoor had revealed Alia and Ranbir wanted to marry in Africa. | Bollywood
articles.content: Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor tied the knot a year ago. The actors married at their Mumbai home Vastu on April 14, 2022. The intimate wedding was attended by only close friends and family. Alia, who w… [+2622 chars]
